context: C64 PETSCII and Screen Codes Reference

splits.name: petscii_codes_complete
splits.description: Complete PETSCII code table ($00-$FF) - control codes, printable characters, graphics symbols, color codes, cursor control, character set switching

splits.name: screen_codes_complete
splits.description: Complete screen code table ($00-$FF) - character codes as stored in screen RAM, mapping between PETSCII and screen codes, uppercase/graphics and lowercase/uppercase character sets

splits.name: petscii_screen_code_conversion
splits.description: PETSCII to screen code conversion tables and rules, keyboard matrix codes, practical reference for text display programming
